transactionId.description: The transactionId for which the payment details have been requested.

transactionType.description: The type of transaction. This can be money owed to HMRC (Debt), or money paid out by HMRC (Payment).

paymentDueDate.description: The date the payment is due.

paymentStatus.description: The status of the transaction being requested.

paymentReference.description: The reference of the payment made.

paymentAmount.description: The amount paid for the transaction.

supersededBy.description: The ID of the transaction that supersedes the current one.
